author: gregames
msg: record something in the error log if the parent process seg faults

author: dougm
msg: allow lwp following of redirects to be disabled

author: bnicholes
msg: Removed the parameter requirement on the _getch macro since getch
doesn't take a parameter.  Patch submitted by Pavel Novy

author: bnicholes
msg: Made sure that the variables ap_listenbacklog and ap_listeners are initialized
before they are used to avoid linker errors when using the NLMCONV utility
to build Apache for NetWare.  Patch submitted by Pavel Novy.
